meanings.sent1: I love to eat kaas with crackers.
meanings.sent2: The kaas at the market was fresh and creamy.
meanings.sent3: The mouse snuck into the kitchen to nibble on the kaas.
meanings.sent4: The kaas melted on the warm bread like a golden blanket.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the kaas filled the room, making my mouth water.

meanings.sent1: She saved up all her kaas to buy a new bike.
meanings.sent2: He worked hard to earn more kaas for his family.
meanings.sent3: Finding a dollar in an old coat felt like striking kaas.
meanings.sent4: In his hands, kaas was like a tool to build a better future.
meanings.sent5: The sound of kaas jingling in his pocket was music to his ears.
